actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend chapter 83 of title 5, United States Code, to bar civil service annuity payments during periods an annuitant is entitled to receive salary as a justice or judge of the United States.

summary.text: Prohibits civil service annuity payments during periods an annuitant is entitled to receive salary as a justice or judge of the United States. (Amends 5 U.S.C. 8344)

titles.title: A bill to amend chapter 83 of title 5, United States Code, to bar civil service annuity payments during periods an annuitant is entitled to receive salary as a justice or judge of the United States.
